snippet.title: Alien: Isolation Official Let's Play - Corporate Lockdown
snippet.description:
Visit the official site: http://www.alienisolation.com
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AlienIsolation
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/AlienIsolation

Get your first look of ‘Corporate Lockdown’, as Nee, our Community Manager takes on the map, ‘Severance’, in our first ever Let’s Play video.

Available for download today, ‘Corporate Lockdown’ is the first of five Survivor Mode add-on packs for Alien: Isolation.

Every add-on pack will offer new perspectives on the events on-board Sevastopol Station in the days before the arrival of the Weyland-Yutani team, with a new playable character, a unique set of objectives and a new game mode.

Check out the footage of the new station areas as Nee takes on the challenge of survival, aided by Lead Games Designer, Gary Napper.

Buy Corporate Lockdown as part of the Alien: Isolation Season Pass here:

Xbox One:
https://store.xbox.com/en-US/Xbox-One/DLC/Alien-Isolation-Corporate-Lockdown/a24c7da0-902b-4639-9e2a-f9f90deacc9e

Xbox 360: 
http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Alien-Isolation-Corporate-Lockdown/628fc994-10f9-41aa-8024-a9cd867e91e0

Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/282512
